metadata.title: CVE-2019-15892 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in Varnish Cache before 6.0.4 LTS, and 6.1.x and6.2.x before 6.2.1. An HTTP/1 parsing failure allows a remote attacker totrigger an assert by sending crafted HTTP/1 requests. The assert will causean automatic restart with a clean cache, which makes it a Denial of Serviceattack.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-15892` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libvarnishapi2 - 6.2.1-2
varnish - 6.2.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: varnish package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.2.1-2').
